comment: Simple class, nice professor. Everything is easy besides the exams. Study for the exams. Our group did our paper and presentation the day before and still got a very high grade. Great elective class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She really cares and is super understanding. Throughout lectures there are "pop quizzes" that count for attendance but not for an actual grade. Attendance counts for a small portion of your grade. Only have to do half of weekly discussion posts and theres a group project but grades pretty easy. Tests are easy if you study even a little. Take her!

She has a strong accent, but it doesn't hinder learning. She uses PowerPoints for the lecture, but listen to what she adds to each point b/c that's what's on the test. All tests are conceptual/appliction, not memorization. Weekly discussion posts. Easy assignments, easy group project, attendance counts toward your grade, overall easy class.
